transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji sir, toh yeh ek hi matlab customer tha ya aur bhi aise customer hai? Kyunki aapne isme aur bahut saara tha aur bhi maine aapko bataya tha, mujhe yaad nahi hai kaun kaun tha woh.
Customer: Yeh toh abhi haal mein hua tha toh yeh mujhe yaad hai aur yeh do hai. Ek toh not reachable aa raha hai, recharge nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ek toh dusra wala jo Kerala wala hai, ek toh seedha ignore maar raha hai. Woh toh seedha 100 piece ka batao, 100 piece ka order jisne dala hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Usko requirement nahi hai toh 100 piece maane yeh toh matlab fake hai ya phir?
Executive: Nahi sir, isme main batati hu isme kya hota hai. Jaise agar customer ki direct inquiry hai na ya yeh aapne buylead consume kari thi?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Yeh buylead consume kari thi ya direct inquiry hai aapki?
Customer: Buylead hai.
Executive: Buylead hai. Toh isme jaise yeh first wale customer ka agar hum dekhte hai yeh 100 pieces wala Banwari wala jo customer hai, inko sabse pehle aapko kya karna hai? Neeche na product list aa raha hai, share product and ek option aa raha hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Agar yaha se yeh call nahi utha rahe hai ya message ka reply nahi kar rahe hai, number bhi reachable nahi ja raha hai toh aap yaha pe kya kariye in customer ko and matlab product ki details aap share kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai? Product details share karne ke baad na neeche ek option aata hai share on WhatsApp.
Customer: Hmm. Haan.
Executive: Share on WhatsApp pe jab aap click karte hai na toh IndiaMART ki taraf se ek message jaata hai ki matlab ek customer aapse baat karna chah raha hai. Toh kyunki IndiaMART ka account har koi normally itna open nahi karta hai. Right? Par WhatsApp toh har koi open karta hi karta hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh aap isme yeh cheez kariye jiske bhi client ka number not reachable aa raha hai na aap unse WhatsApp se connect kariye. Usse kya hoga na aapko thoda sa idea ho jayega kaun sa client interested hai, kispe aapko jyada time dena chahiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Aur yeh jo dusre wale client hai yeh phone nahi utha rahe hai, ho sakta hai yeh matlab aapka number abhi nahi pehchan pa rahe ho. Toh inpe bhi aap same process follow kariye jo inki requirement aayi hai. Inpe bhi aap product ki details aap share kariye aur connect kariye WhatsApp par.
Executive: Iska reason yeh hota hai simple sa jaise aap Amazon se bhi aap kuch buy karte hai. Toh Amazon pe agar koi message aata hai ya notification aap aata hai toh aap rarely bahut open wish open karte honge.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na? Aur wahi customer Amazon wale customer ya supplier woh aapko WhatsApp pe connect kare toh aap ek dum se dekh lenge unke messages.
Executive: Theek hai? Par isse clarity aapko bhi simple yeh ho jayega ki kaun sa client interested hai matlab kis mein aapko jyada invest karna chahiye apna time. Simple sa process ho jayega apna.
Customer: Sir theek hai ab iska pura detail mujhe share kariye yeh kyun mana kiya customer kitne lead banaye kaise hai yeh mujhe bataye kyunki ek week nahi bahut saari lead aisi ho chuki hai. Ya toh aapke bande sahi se kaam nahi kar rahe hai ya kya hai woh aap dhyan dijiye woh aapke upar depend karta hai.
Executive: Woh aapki baat sir bilkul theek hai par kya hota hai na kabhi bhi koi bhi lead jaise mujhe aap detail bata dijiye ki yeh nahi aap iska mujhe detail bataye ki bande kaise lead bani hai. Uska recording suniye aap log dekhiye kaise bande kaam nahi kar rahe hai toh yeh sab dhyan aap denge na. Aise 10 you complain aane lage.
Customer: Kam se kam toh 10 complain toh maine hi dal diya aise.
Executive: Woh aapki baat bilkul theek hai sir par kya hota hai na jaise koi customer ek buylead generate hoti hai na uske samne ek checklist form hota hai jisme usko char panch details fill karni hoti hai.
Customer: Meri baat aap samjhiye dekhiye main full form bharunga jab main interested rahunga tabhi form bharunga. Main pagal thodi na hu ki koi 100 piece ka requirement aise manmani dalta rahe yeh toh koi pagal baitha hua hai, faltu insan hai jiske paas time hi time hai. Toh woh jaake aapse yeh kaam karega. Jiske paas time nahi hai woh faltu apna 10 minute 15 minute waste karega nahi karega?
Executive: Nahi karega bilkul nahi karega.
Customer: Toh phir usko baat karne ke liye time nahi hai. Haan woh seedha bol raha hai mujhe nahi chahiye aur yeh faltu kaam karne ke liye time hai usko?
Executive: Isme sir yahi ho sakta hai jaise is client ne jab buylead generate kari hogi na ho sakta hai yeh maximum call ki wajah se inhone interested na dikhaya ho aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi maximum call ka nahi hai aisa reason hai. Woh maximum call jiska rehta hai woh seedha bolta hai ki bhaiya maine woh mujhse baat kiya usne bola ki mujhe chahiye nahi. Kaise laga mujhe nahi pata woh itna bhi nahi baat karega. Woh seedha bolega ki yaar mujhe nahi chahiye toh aap call kar kar kyun kar rahe ho aap kahan se baat kar rahe ho. Woh itna bolega kaam khatam. Woh yeh nahi kahega mujhe nahi chahiye mujhe kya pata kahan se laga yaar kahan nahi jab itna hi chahiye toh woh bol deta ki haan maine diya dekha tha ab mujhe nahi chahiye.
Executive: Actually hota hai na sir kabhi kabhi customer frustrated hokar yeh cheez bol dete hai ki humne nahi post kara hai.
Customer: Aap yeh aap yeh aapka headache nahi hai yeh aap pehle iska confirmation aap apni taraf se soch ke nahi kar sakti na ki customer frustrated hoke bol diya ya kya bol diya pehle aap iski jaanch kariye ki actual mein hua kya hai. Sahi hai ya nahi hai aap pehle apna logic laga de rahe ho customer frustrated tha ya kya tha woh toh baad mein customer frustrated bhi rahega toh woh bolega na.
Executive: Jaise abhi aapne khud hi bataya ki koi customer ki requirement hoti hai main bhi main yeh bol raha hu frustrated toh main 10 customer se main har hafte 17 customer se baat karta hu. 17 ka matlab itna milta hai mujhe 10 lead aur 17 17 lead mein baat karta hu. Toh har customer se toh main baat karta hu toh mujhe pata chalta hai ki kya reply aa rahi hai kya nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir definitely aap abhi yeh problem aa raha hai iska main definitely iske bare mein check karungi kyun aa raha hai. Aap yeh check karke mujhe batao apna logic na lagao please logic lagane se pehle kaam karo.
Customer: Aap baat dekh ke isko check karke mujhe batao aap theek hai apne.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving fake buyleads.

- Wants details on why customer refused.

- Believes executives are not working properly.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to connect via WhatsApp.

- Executive will check why the problem is occurring.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and inform the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, customer experience, resolution, whatsapp
